short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds Reddit posts for URLs you visit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that finds Reddit posts about the web URL of your current active tab.
- Each post found can be navigated to from the extension.
- A new post can be made for the URL via the create post button.


Implemented with Vue 3.
